metadata.title: CVE-2020-15591 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: fexsrv in F*EX (aka Frams' Fast File EXchange) before fex-20160919_2 allowseval injection (for unauthenticated remote code execution).

criterions.comment: fex: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
